bilingual.source: First, mix together some bread pieces, onions, salt and pepper.
bilingual.target: 首先，把一些面包块、洋葱、盐和胡椒混合在一起。
她更喜欢黑胡椒而不是白胡椒。

bilingual.source: Can you pass me the black pepper?
We need to buy a new pepper shaker.
bilingual.target: 我们需要买一个新的胡椒瓶。

bilingual.source: She sprinkled some pepper into the soup.
bilingual.target: 她在汤里撒了一些胡椒。

bilingual.source: The recipe calls for a pinch of pepper.
bilingual.target: 这个食谱需要一小撮胡椒。

list.abstract: 胡志威，曾用游戏ID：Y1HAN，男，前RoyalNeverGiveUp（RNG）战队成员，位置：打野。2018赛季，胡志威效力于WE战队担任队内打野一职，使用新的游戏ID：Pepper。 2018年12月16日，胡志威以转会形式，转入至V5电子竞技俱乐部。 2019年5月25日，胡志威正式离开V5电子竞技俱乐部。
Pepper是一款会表达情绪的人形机器人，由日本软银集团和法国Aldebaran Robotics研发，于2015年6月Pepper正式面向普通消费者发售。 该机器人配备了语音识别技术、呈现优美姿态的关节技术，以及分析表情和声调的情绪识别技术，可综合考虑周围环境，并积极主动地作出反应，与人类进行交流。

yingyinNormal.en: Pepper? None for me. Okay sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡椒？我不用。好，对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have allergies? No. Is there too much pepper on your salad? I don't put pepper on salads.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有过敏症吗？没有。你在沙拉上放太多胡椒粉了吗？我没在沙拉上加胡椒粉。

yingyinNormal.en: Next we need a teaspoon of pepper, which, I believe, was also the name of your childhood dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来我们需要一茶匙的胡椒，你小时候养的狗也正好叫胡椒。

yingyinNormal.en: Now the seasoning, light soy sauce and a pinch of ground white pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在开始调味，加点生抽和一点白胡椒粉。

yingyinNormal.en: And then a little bit of pepper, just a little bit. Then in with the meat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后加入一点胡椒粉，一点就好。然后加入牛肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Finally, some white and black pepper and a pinch of salt. Now mix that up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后，再加入一些黑白胡椒粉和少许盐，把它们搅拌均匀。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just going to season it now with a little bit of light soy sauce, a bit of ground black pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我要加调味料，一点生抽，一点黑胡椒粉。

yingyinNormal.en: The minced prawns are bound together with salt, powdered chicken stock, potato flour and ground white pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 剁碎的虾仁加盐、鸡汤粉、土豆粉和白胡椒粉拌在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Gives it great fragrance and aroma, just lifts the whole dish. Maybe a little bit of ground white pepper as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它有很棒的香味，会让整道菜香气扑鼻。然后再加一点儿白胡椒粉。

yingyinNormal.en: Also, got these great salt and pepper shakers from the restaurant. That's not cool. Dude, none of this is cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，我从餐厅里拿了这些盐巴胡椒罐。这不好。兄弟，这一切都不好。

yingyinNormal.en: Pinch of sea salt, some ground white pepper, some chopped spring onions, and about four cloves of chopped garlic. In with some grated ginger for some heat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加少许海盐，一些白胡椒粉，一些葱花，还有约四瓣蒜末，再加些姜末，增加点辣味。

yingyinNormal.en: Enrico's wife said the best way of cooking the fish is frying it, so we've seasoned it, little bit of salt, little bit of pepper, looking pretty good, to be honest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恩里克的妻子说做鱼的最好方式是煎，我们已经弄熟了，放点盐，加点胡椒，说真的，看上去很不错 。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: There's pineapple shrimp and lemon shrimp, coconut shrimp, pepper shrimp, shrimp soup, shrimp stew, shrimp salad, shrimp in potatoes, shrimp burger, shrimp sandwich. That's about it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有菠萝虾、柠檬虾、椰子虾、胡椒虾、鲜虾汤、油焖虾、虾肉色拉、土豆虾、虾肉汉堡包、虾肉三明治。还有…差不多就这些了。

yingyinNormal.en: They did it at Pepper's New Year's Steve party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们在胡娇家的新年史蒂夫派对上也是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚饭后，我们两个和辣椒，在炉火前面睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: He runs more of the business than anyone besides Pepper. Top of the line. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他掌管的事务比谁都多，除了佩珀，堪称一流。是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Throw in the chillies. A few of those. Couple of teaspoons of the Sichuan pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入辣椒，少许即可。几茶匙四川花椒。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! Beautiful. Okay. She looks like Pepper's pomeranian. We have to say something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真漂亮。她看起来就像胡娇家的小博美，我们得说说她。

yingyinNormal.en: Or, at least what I thought was a log. Oh my God. You threw Pepper on the fire. I wish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至少我以为那是一条木柴。我的天，你把辣椒丢进火里了。我才想呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book. Build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我向巴顿学习一下，给佩珀建个农场，但愿没人想炸翻它。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The moth's ability also to attack crops like <highlight>pepper</highlight> and potatoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种蛾也有能力攻击像胡椒和土豆这样的作物。

examination_example.sentence: The camp manager suggested I use <highlight>pepper</highlight> spray.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 营地经理建议我用胡椒喷雾。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence:
One day Carlos asked Miss Jones why 
<highlight>Pepper</highlight> was sill at the shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，卡洛斯问琼斯小姐为什么佩珀在避难所里躺着。

examination_example.sentence: To study how self-dialogue might influence <highlight>Pepper</highlight>'s actions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究如何进行自我对话可能会影响佩珀的行为。

examination_example.sentence: With or without inner speech, <highlight>Pepper</highlight> could complete a task equally well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论有没有内心的言语，佩珀都能同样出色地完成任务。

examination_example.sentence: That tomato sauce you're making is made of tomatoes, onions, garlic, salt and <highlight>pepper</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你做的番茄酱是由番茄、洋葱、大蒜、盐和胡椒粉制成的。

examination_example.sentence: A few days later we went to a greenhouse and came back not with green onion but <highlight>peppers</highlight>, tomatoes and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几天后，我们去了温室，拿回来的不是大葱，而是柿子椒、西红柿等。
